titles.title: To expand opportunities for employment of recent graduates in Federal Government positions, and for other purposes.
To expand opportunities for employment of recent graduates in Federal Government positions, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
